response.original_title: Diario di Manarola. Appunti per un film sull'esperienza di Telemaco Signorini alle cinque terre
response.overview: Made for the Liguria program: 90 years of cinema. The precious superimposition of two diaries: the personal one, written and filmed by the director and his companions of moments lived in Manarola, and that of Telemaco Signorini, an artist focused on the Cinque Terre who feels the need to nourish his figurative obsession with theoretical insights for that same place where Amico's daily life takes place with Olympic prosaicity.
response.title: Diario di Manarola. Appunti per un film sull'esperienza di Telemaco Signorini alle cinque terre
